name: Beagle Bag
overview: Beagle Bag is a compilation of new and previously released Apple II games by Beagle Bros. The games Included are: - Texttrain - The player tries to sort letters by moving them around a racetrack. - Sub Search - Attempt to find 6 submarines hidden around the screen in a limited time frame. - Slippery Digits - Number sliding puzzle where the character tries to put the numbers 1 - 15 in order in a 4 x 4 box. - Name Game - Rearranges a person's name into Pig-Latin, Faux-Polish and more. - Magic Pack - A number of "magic tricks" designed to trick novice computer users. - Hang Person - A 1 - 2 person Hangman game. - Gas Crunch - A game of Nim utilizing 15 gas cans. - Elevator Crunch - See how many people you can load into 4 elevators between 5:00 and 5:30. - Date Search - Calculate the number of days between two dates. - Buzzword - A Phrasal template word game, where the player types the first letter of blanks in a story. - Wowzo - 2 players attempt to navigate a maze, each turn a player gets one move, and can flip one piece of the maze. - Triple Digits - 2 player game where players place numbers on a board attempting to scores runs of 3 for points. - Quick-Draw! - The player needs to hit a button immediately upon the correct character appearing on the screen to shoot their opponent. - Oink! - Two players take turns rolling two dice. The player rolls to accumulate points, and can hold at any time. If they get doubles they lose all non-held points.
